citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The environmental enrichment plan for birds is inadequate. The plan states that toys and swings, a variety of food, and
bird baths will be provided. One cage containing a Pale-headed Rosella and a Blue Pennant Rosella contained a single
perch with a chewed perch on the floor of the enclosure. No other enrichment was provided. It is imperative that birds be
provided adequate environmental and social enrichment to ensure their psychological well-being and welfare. Correct by
developing, documenting, and following a vet-approved bird enrichment plan by Oct 31, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee at the Fort Smith Fairgrounds in Fort Smith, AR.
Additional Inspectors:
Jason Sifkarovski, Veterinary Medical Officer n

narrative:
3.154(b) 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The environmental enrichment plan for birds is inadequate. The plan states that toys and swings, a variety of food, and 
bird baths will be provided. One cage containing a Pale-headed Rosella and a Blue Pennant Rosella contained a single 
perch with a chewed perch on the floor of the enclosure. No other enrichment was provided. It is imperative that birds be 
provided adequate environmental and social enrichment to ensure their psychological well-being and welfare. Correct by 
developing, documenting, and following a vet-approved bird enrichment plan by Oct 31, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee at the Fort Smith Fairgrounds in Fort Smith, AR. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jason Sifkarovski, Veterinary Medical Officer n
